name: Open Day at the Berlin Cathedral: Hohenzollern Crypt Reopening
description: The Berlin Cathedral's Open Day in 2026 is all about the grand reopening of the Hohenzollern crypt, one of the most important and largest dynastic burial chambers in Europe containing 91 unique coffins and magnificent sarcophagi. After six years of extensive restoration work, the crypt will be accessible again with a new digital concept and interesting new details about the rulers buried there.
